title.rendered: Immediate Edge reviews 2022 – Is it really a scam?

content.rendered:
Is it possible to withdraw earlier than planned? Many people will jump at the opportunity to retire early. You can travel the world and live your best life if you retire with a source of passive income.

This is a dream that we always defend, and it is possible when you trade with automated systems designed for cryptocurrencies.

Why doesn’t everyone make money from the cryptocurrency market? We know that many people have not figured out how effective cryptocurrency auto trading platforms are, they still think back to the old days when the best skills were needed to make money in the cryptocurrency market.

The trends have changed. Now, you don’t need to know anything about cryptocurrency trading, if you have enough money to meet the minimum requirements, you can invest and start earning more money daily.

We have been studying cryptocurrency trading systems for a long time, and no one pays attention to manual trading processes anymore. Everyone is interested in earning from the cryptocurrency market with the use of auto trading platforms. This is the situation because automated cryptocurrency trading platforms are easy to use and there is less chance of error during the trading session.

In this post, we have written about one of the best cryptocurrency auto trading platforms. It’s called Immediate Edge. We selected Immediate Edge for this post because it stands out in so many ways. If there is one thing we are sure of, it is that only the best auto trading systems should be used. In this way, the investor can avoid market risks and conveniently earn more money.

For this Immediate Edge review, we made sure that all our tests were done in real time. We needed to trust the authenticity of our results before offering our opinion on Immediate Edge.

trade now

Please read the summary of our Immediate Edge review;

  • Immediate Edge is a legitimate cryptocurrency auto trading platform. We confirm this by verifying the platform’s registration details, which is accurate and up-to-date.
  • The minimum deposit required to start trading with Immediate Edge is $250, this is affordable compared to other auto trading platforms.
  • Immediate Edge has one of the fastest withdrawal systems, and the payout is always accurate.
  • To get started, the user must create an account, which can be done in less than five minutes.

What is Immediate Edge?

Immediate Edge is a cryptocurrency trading platform. It is an automated system that can be used to take advantage of offers in different types of cryptocurrencies.

We found many testimonials online confirming that most of the investors who have used Immediate Edge made a profit from the cryptocurrency market. We also found out why the success rate is so high. Investors who trade with Immediate Edge can earn money every day because the platform has a 98% success rate. The success rate is high because a special algorithm improves the functions of the trading robot to detect the best conditions to make a trade.

How does it work

We had a great time trying out the live trading feature on Immediate Edge. It works with a simple but very effective process. Trading robots can be used when the investor has funded their account. The money in the users account is used to buy cryptocurrencies, which are sold for profit on the market. Trading robots can be activated with one click.

Additionally, we noted that different currency pairs could be selected during a live trading session. This is an advantage that allows the system to operate in different industries. The entire trading process is automated. We do not need to do anything while using the auto trading feature.

How to create an account

We were happy to find that the account creation process is very simple. It’s also fast. Investors can open an account and start making money with Immediate Edge in less than twenty minutes.

Register an account

The registration process is simple, we were required to provide information such as the account owner’s full name, email and phone number.

After submitting this information for verification, we study some other features on the trading platform. There are helpful icons on all web pages, to direct new users who are exploring the auto trading platform for the first time.

How to make a deposit

We made a deposit of $250 to start our live trading experience. We decided to start with $250, it is the best option for new users.

We made a deposit in a matter of seconds, there are many payment platforms that can be used to transfer funds. We saw the logos of Skrill, MasterCard, Visa and other online payment platforms. We think it is a good idea to provide alternative payment platforms because there are many users from all over the world. Immediate Edge can be used in more than 120 countries.

Our payment was made with a MasterCard, we transferred the sum of $250 to our new account.

demo trading

We tested the demo trading feature, it works perfectly. It is a free trading platform, you don’t need money to use it and there are no profits. It’s just a demo.

live trading

We had one of the best live trading experiences with Immediate Edge. All features and buttons work, and the live trading process was fully automated. We don’t need to do anything. My team watched auto trading robots make money for us and our arms were crossed.

Immediate Edge can be used by anyone to make money easily, and they don’t need to be around. Trading robots do all the work.

There are many advantages to trading with Immediate Edge. Our mission was completed after testing the live trading feature. We confirm that every user could earn money from the cryptocurrency market without any effort.

We are very impressed with the fast processes that make it seem easy to complete hundreds of transactions in a very short time. We know that market trends can change in seconds, to make money with the best trades it is essential that the trading system works very fast.

Apart from being easy to use, investors at Immediate Edge can use the system freely without any worries due to the advanced online security systems that we noticed in the auto trading platform. The verification system prevents unauthorized actions on the site. And user information for all accounts is encrypted.

Also, the high success rate is an additional guarantee that increases the chances of making more money with Immediate Edge.

Guidelines for new investors

We have written some important guidelines that can help new investors make better use of the auto trading platform;

Create a day trading schedule

It is better to trade every day. We do not believe that new investors should miss out on any opportunity to make money from the cryptocurrency market. And on average, a user only needs to spend less than twenty minutes to use the live trading platform.

Start with a small investment

It is a good idea to start small when using Immediate Edge. We recommend that investors start with a minimum deposit of $250.

Withdraw your earnings

Your payout value is calculated after each trading session ends. It is better if you withdraw your profits and reinvest the initial capital.

Invest your free money

Don’t invest your life savings, instead it’s best if you only invest your disposable income.

Is there a mobile app?

There is no Immediate Edge mobile app. The trading system can be used through any web browser on mobile phones, tablets or laptops.

Immediate Edge Review: The Verdict!

We have tested all the features of Immediate Edge, the platform is excellent. It offers new and old investors who want it, a constant passive income generation stream to make money in the cryptocurrency market. Immediate Edge is legit, it is one of the best auto trading platforms we have used in recent times. We encourage everyone to start earning from the cryptocurrency market with Immediate Edge.

Frequent questions

Can Immediate Edge be trusted?

Yes, it is a registered cryptocurrency auto trading platform. We have tested all its features, Immediate Edge has a high success rate, transactions are also very fast.

How much do you need to pay to get an account?

There is no need for any payment. Registering an account with Immediate Edge is free. The account registration process is also very fast.

How is the money withdrawn from the account?

You can withdraw your winnings after calculating the payment. The withdrawal process can be started from the withdrawal page, by clicking a button. Immediate Edge has one of the fastest withdrawal systems, funds are transferred to the users linked bank account within 24 hours.

Can I withdraw cryptocurrencies from the platform?

No, this is not possible, the value obtained after a live trading session is converted to the local currency before being transferred to the bank account.
